SEARCH
Package main.java.boundaries

Class CustomerOrderingForm

java.lang.Object
main.java.boundaries.CustomerOrderingForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Form
public class CustomerOrderingForm extends Object implements Form
A form for customers as a boundary level object to order items and modify their order cart. This form is implemented from the Form interface.
Since:
24-Apr-2024
Version:
1.2
Author:
SDDA Team 1

    • CustomerOrderingForm

      public CustomerOrderingForm(CustomerSession session, Scanner scanner)

  • Method Details

    • generateForm

      public void generateForm()
      Generates the ordering form and handles customer's input for orders. It includes options such as view menu (1), starting new order (2), display cart (3), edit cart (4), submit order (5) and return to homescreen. Checks if customer input is within available options 1-6.
      Specified by:
      generateForm in interface Form

    • editCart

      private Order editCart(Order customOrder)
      Method to edit the items in the customer's cart, asking customers if they would like to add or remove cart items or if they are done. Checks if customer input is within available options 1-3.
      Parameters:
      customOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order after editing the cart.

    • changeDineInOption

      private Order changeDineInOption(Order customerOrder)
      Method that helps customers change the dinein status. Check if input
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order after updating the dinein status.

    • removeItem

      private Order removeItem(Order customerOrder)
      Method that removes an item from the customer's cart. Checks for valid input of either take away (1) or dine-in (2).
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order after removing the item.

    • startNewOrder

      private Order startNewOrder(Order customerOrder)
      Method to starts a new order for the customer. Checks if order list is empty.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order after starting a new order.

    • addItemsToCart

      private Order addItemsToCart(Order customerOrder)
      Method to add items to the customer's cart. Checks if Item to order is not available or invalid.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order after adding items to the cart.

    • chooseDineInOrTakeAway

      private Order chooseDineInOrTakeAway(Order customerOrder)
      Method to choose whether the order is for dine-in or take-away. Checks for valid input of either take away (1) or dine-in (2).
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.
      Returns:
      The updated customer's order with the chosen option.

    • submitOrder

      private void submitOrder(Order customerOrder)
      Method to submit or cancel the customer's order, once they are done.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.

    • displayCart

      private void displayCart(Order customerOrder)
      Method to displays the customer's cart. Checks if no order is found or if cart is empty.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer's order.

    • showMenuItems

      private void showMenuItems()
      Method to display the menu items available for ordering. Prints a message if no menu items are available.

    • getComment

      private String getComment()
      Method to add special requests for an item in the order as a comment.
      Returns:
      The special requests provided by the user.

    • getQty

      private int getQty()
      Method to retrieve the quantity of items. Checks if quantity inputted is less than 0, which is invalid.
      Returns:
      The quantity of items provided by the user.
